body:
Hello I am mariogamer9 my friend was nice enough to let me use his account to get onto the forums, but lets get down to the point I (mariogamer9) was falsely banned for "Click Aimbot." For no reason! I want to make it clear that I was NOT hacking, have never hacked anything in my LIFE. Avicus was one of my favorite servers. Please unban me. 
One more thing, the server glitched and it said I was banned at 12:41 am  when it was really 7:32 pm.
Please unban me, it will mean alot.

title: Falsely  Banned (mariogamer9)

replies.body:
The forums are not the place for this.

E-mail support@avicus.net to appeal.
